application.name: Event and task manager
application.summary: Manage events and tasks using simple text files

ul.li: A sales meeting (an event) [s]tarting seven days from today at 9:00am and [e]xtending for one hour with a default [a]lert 5 minutes before the start: * sales meeting @s +7 9a @e 1h @a 5

Get a haircut (a task) on the 24th of the current month and then [r]epeatedly at (d)aily [i]ntervals of (14) days and, [o]n completion, (r)estart from the completion date: - get haircut @s 24 @r d &i 14 @o r
